alert.note: Alert for Orange County Coastal; Orange County Inland; San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire; Santa Ana Mountains and Foothills (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 10 at 11:20AM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Riverside and northeastern Orange Counties through NOON PST... At 1120 AM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Silverado, or near Corona, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Anaheim, Riverside, Irvine, Moreno Valley, Corona, Orange, Mission Viejo, Tustin, Lake Elsinore, Laguna Beach, Murrieta, Perris, Laguna Niguel, Rancho Santa Margarita, Aliso Viejo, San Juan Capistrano, Laguna Woods, Trabuco Canyon, Woodcrest and Silverado. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
